system.name: Miasma
system.effect:
Trigger - Your Pokémon misses with a Poison-Type Move
Effect: Your Pokémon may use either Smokescreen or Poison Gas as if they were on their Move List. When used this way, these Moves ignore Frequency Limitations, and are used as a Ranged Blast 3, with the blast centered on the square targeted by the triggering attack. Poison-Type Pokémon are not negatively affected by Smoke Screens created this way. Your Pokémon may also trigger Miasma deliberately as a Standard Action.
system.prerequisites: Potent Venom, Type-Linked Skill at Expert
